doc:
Russ Columbo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russ_Columbo 0 Ruggiero Eugenio di Rodolfo Colombo (January 14, 1908 – September 2, 1934), known as Russ Columbo, was an American baritone, songwriter, violinist and actor. He is famous for romantic ballads such as his signature tune "You Call It Madness, But I Call It Love" and his own compositions "Prisoner of Love" and "Too Beautiful For Words." Ruggiero_Eugenio_di_Rodolfo_Colombo ( January_14_,_1908 – September_2_,_1934 ) , known as Russ_Columbo , was an_American_baritone , songwriter , violinist_and_actor . He is famous for romantic_ballads such_as his_signature_tune " You Call It Madness , But I Call It Love " and his_own_compositions " Prisoner of Love " and " Too_Beautiful For Words .
